job.title: (USA) Principal Software Engineer - Capacity and Cost Modeling
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout The TeamltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtPosition Summary What youll doltbrgtltbrgtAs a part of Global Platforms Infrastructure Services youll help to build an industrydefining approach to managing multicloud and enterprise capacity across all of Walmarts markets The team is responsible for helping our internal customers plan and scale for holiday events and other activities through a combination of tactical and strategic approaches to capacity planning Youll be responsible for combining data science and machinelearning approaches to predict demand with an outreach model that helps us guide users toward more efficiency decisions related to both cloud and noncloud computing infrastructure across several private data centers and multiple public cloud providersltbrgtltbrgtYou will be in a position to ensure that critical parts of Walmarts business are prepared for known events while having ample capacity available to address any contingency You will be driving data analysis to connect software engineers and the infrastructure teams with the data that enables them to scale You will be acting as a team lead for data analysts focused on workload classification cloud computing predictive modeling and customer outreachltbrgtltbrgtThe ideal candidate will be an individual who has had experience developing and supporting complex data models at scale and who can communicate nuance assumptions and data models to several levels of executive managementltbrgtltbrgtYoull sweep us off our feet ifltbrgtltulgtltligtYou are a storyteller visionary and innovatorltligtltligtYou understand data technologies and various tools available to develop modelsltligtltligtYoure customercentric in spirit and in executionltligtltligtYoure comfortable influencing others leading teams managing stakeholders getting buyin from leadership and communicating clearlyltligtltligtYou have a test and learn mentality and an agile way of working to improve your teams productsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYoull Make An Impact ByltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtConducting industry and competitive analysis to understand Walmarts opportunities to make better use of capacity through efficiency analysis and by leverage new techniques in cloudltligtltligtPartnering with our Business Partners and Global Technology teams to ensure consistent standards related to cost and capacity modelingltligtltligtBringing Passion to capacity planning to ensure that Walmart is prepared for any contingencyltligtltligtBuilding a team environment by partnering to solve problems and staying focused till there is a solutionltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMasters degree in Computer Science or related field and 5 years experience in software engineeringltligtltligt4 years in development andor operations on public cloudltligtltligtExperience analyzing data in largescale data warehouses such as BigQuery Databricks or a similar technologyltligtltligtExperience leveraging data technologies such as BigQuery Cassandra CosmosDB or SpannerltligtltligtQuantitative or engineering background is preferredltligtltligtPlatform experience is highly desirableltligtltligtSound business judgment as well as ability to think clearly analyze quantitatively problemsolve scope technical requirements and prioritizeltligtltligtMust be able and willing to think and act strategically and tacticallyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefits ampamp PerksltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great perks include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans and much moreltbrgtltbrgtEqual Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtWalmart Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer  By Choice We believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them That means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions  while being inclusive of all peopleltbrgtltbrgtWho We AreltbrgtltbrgtJoin Walmart and your work could help over 275 million global customers live better every week Yes we are the Fortune 1 company But youll quickly find were a company who wants you to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to work A career at Walmart is where the worlds most complex challenges meet a kinder way of life Our mission spreads far beyond the walls of our stores Join us and youll discover why we are a world leader in diversity and inclusion sustainability and community involvement From day one youll be empowered and equipped to do the best work of your life
